articles.title: Jersey agrees to buy 500,000 coronavirus antibody tests - enough to test its population FIVE TIMES - Daily Mail
articles.description: The first 10,000 tests are being rigorously analysed by the government to make sure they are reliable enough. If they are, an 'Island-wide testing programme' will begin.
articles.content:
Jersey has secured a deal to buy 500,000 coronavirus antibody tests - enough to test its population five times for signs of past infection.

articles.description: The famous physicist's daughter is urging everyone to "support NHS staff in every way possible" during the coronavirus outbreak.
